word_mean: 期间：一段时间，如电刺激施加的时间长度
一个波形占有或跨越的时间，一般从该波离开基线时起量至下一点返回至基线的相应位置上

sentence.Network_en: His wounds knocked him out of combat for the duration.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的伤病使他在整个期间都无法参赛。

sentence.Network_en: The school was used as a hospital for the duration of the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 战争期间这所学校被用作医院。

sentence.Network_en: The principal issues in dispute concern the duration of the future treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 有争议的主要问题牵涉到将来条约的期限.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... durable a 持久的 duration n 持续时间 endure v 持久，耐久.
普特英语听力_百度文库 ... durable a. 耐用的，持久的 duration n. 持续，持续期间 dusk n. 黄昏，薄暮.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 在过程中 in the course of 在期间 Duration 在不抵触合同的情况下 subject to a contract.
字母D开头的单词_百度知道 ... dumb a. 哑的；无言的，沉默的 duration n. 持续，持久 debate n.&v. 争论，辩论.

list.abs: 物理专业词汇英语翻译(M-Q) ... pulse discharge 脉冲放电 pulse duration 脉冲持续时间 pulse generator 脉冲发生器.
(2)工期(Project Duration)，其又分建设工期与合同工期。建设工期(Duration of Project Construction)是指工程项目或单项工程从正式.
生物学词汇英语翻译(Q-Z) ... sunlight 日光 sunshine duration 日照时间 super solenoid 超螺线管.
图片视频信号 1.1.2 根据信号所占时间范围可将信号分为:因果信号、逆因果信号在信号处理中,常将信号值不恒为零的持续时间,称为信号持续时间(signal duration)。.

jx.jx_en_mean: until the end of something, especially a war
jx.jx_cn_mean: 直到结束（尤指直至战争结束）

lj.lj_ly: some stains may be there for the duration.
lj.lj_ls: 一些污迹可能长期地留在那里。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from medieval Latin duratio(n-), from durare 'to last', from durus 'hard'

entry.tran: (某事件或状态的)持续时间,期间
entry.def: The duration of an event or state is the time during which it happens or exists.

example.ex: He was given the task of protecting her for the duration of the trial...
example.tran: 他的任务是在审讯期间保护她。

example.ex: Courses are of two years' duration.

entry.def: If you say that something will happen for the duration, you mean that it will happen for as long as a particular situation continues.

example.ex: His wounds knocked him out of combat for the duration.
example.tran: 他的伤病使他在整个期间都无法参赛。

means.word_mean: 1. the period of time during which something continues
2. the property of enduring or continuing in time

sentences.sentence: "he complained about the length of time required"

auth_sentence.content: Registration laws should be narrowed in scope and duration.
auth_sentence.res_content: Registration laws should be narrowed in scope and duration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Registration laws should be narrowed in scope and duration.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only past and future have longer duration than now.

auth_sentence.content: Which allowed it to hover for the shortest duration?

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

jushi.english: The duration of service is ten years.
The storm was of short duration.
